### VERSION ###
DKSET(NDK_VERSION android-ndk-r21e)

### INSTALL ###
IF(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	DKINSTALL(https://dl.google.com/android/repository/${NDK_VERSION}-windows-x86_64.zip android-ndk ${NDK_VERSION})
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/${NDK_VERSION}" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_APPLE)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/${NDK_VERSION})
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/${NDK_VERSION}-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/${NDK_VERSION}-darwin-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	DKDKSET(NDK "${3RDPARTY}/${NDK_VERSION}")
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/${NDK_VERSION})
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/${NDK_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/${NDK_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	DKDKSET(NDK "${3RDPARTY}/${NDK_VERSION}")
ENDIF()
